articles.title: Impeachment Through the Eyes of a Child
articles.description: In one of our favorite episodes of the year, we spoke with Leo, a third grader, who answered all the questions about the inquiry that you might have been too afraid to ask.
articles.content:
Bianca Giaever contributed reporting.
The Daily is made by Theo Balcomb, Andy Mills, Lisa Tobin, Rachel Quester, Lynsea Garrison, Annie Brown, Clare Toeniskoetter, Paige Cowett, Michael Simon Johnson, Brad Fisher, Larissa Anderson, Wendy Dorr, Chris Wood, Je… [+457 chars]
